TestMethod.Description: Note that TLS 1.2 defines this extension differently.  TLS 1.3 implementations willing to negotiate TLS 1.2 MUST behave in accordance with the requirements of [RFC5246] when negotiating that version. In particular:[...]ECDSA signature schemes align with TLS 1.2's ECDSA hash/signature pairs.  However, the old semantics did not constrain the signing curve.  If TLS 1.2 is negotiated, implementations MUST be prepared to accept a signature that uses any curve that they advertised in the "supported_groups" extension.
